function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The process industry may be vulnerable to contagious diseases due to the high density of workers and the potential for disease spread within the built environment.","Impact":"Unmitigated, a contagious disease outbreak could lead to widespread illness among workers, disruption of operations, and potential economic losses.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict health and safety protocols, conducting regular testing, and providing vaccination programs can help mitigate the impact of contagious diseases.","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, contact tracing apps, and remote monitoring technologies can assist in lowering the probability of disease spread within the built environment.","People":"Workers in the process industry, particularly those working in close proximity to others, are at risk of contracting contagious diseases.","Owner":"Employers and management in the process industry can implement the mitigation strategies."}]}
